project.name: J-C190B-JENA-05-ST03-DT01-DF05-CF03-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="2000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="32767" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_EnyLPTdAxISa4aA6SSGo AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_kkiBcT8Va3 OR (NOT finished_MOs1afnbIK AND NOT (controlled_exit_NuRzRg9IS8 OR continued_execution_gjiRYz1UZE)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_kkiBcT8Va3 OR (NOT finished_MOs1afnbIK AND NOT (controlled_exit_NuRzRg9IS8 OR continued_execution_gjiRYz1UZE))) OR controlled_exit_NuRzRg9IS8)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_kkiBcT8Va3 OR (NOT finished_MOs1afnbIK AND NOT (controlled_exit_NuRzRg9IS8 OR continued_execution_gjiRYz1UZE)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_kkiBcT8Va3 OR (NOT finished_MOs1afnbIK AND NOT (controlled_exit_NuRzRg9IS8 OR continued_execution_gjiRYz1UZE))) OR controlled_exit_NuRzRg9IS8))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
